Menzi Ngubane (28 Ọgọst 1964 13 Machị 2021) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ Sibusiso Dlomo na ihe nkiri ncha Generations site n'afọ 2003 ruo 2014. Ngubane rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi TV ndị ọzọ nke South Africa, gụnyere Yizo Yizo, Ashes to Ashes, Gold Diggers, na Heist. N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn Isibaya, na-eme onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ tagzi nke nwere ihe a na-enyo enyo n'oge gara aga.

Ngubane pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa, gụnyere How to Steal 2 Million, ya na John Kani, Terry Pheto na Rapulana Seiphemo. Ihe nkiri ahụ meriri Best Picture na 2012 African Movie Academy Awards.
O meriri ihe nrite SAFTa maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Isibaya.
Ọ lụrụ Sikelelwa Sishuba. Ngubane nwere ọrịa ruo ọtụtụ afọ gụnyere ịnata nkwonkwo akụrụ nke dugara n'ọnwụ ya.
Ngubane nwụrụ site na ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ  na 13 Machị 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 56. Ụbọchị atọ ka ọ nwụsịrị, nna ya dị afọ 90 bụ Ndodeni Ngubane nwụkwara
E liri ha abụọ ọnụ, ememe olili ozu ha mere n'ụlọ ha na Ladysmith.
